description: Free ChatGPT 4o: ChatGPT4o.ai provides a free, user-friendly online ChatGPT4o chat interface for AI conversations.
title: ChatGPT4o.ai: Free ChatGPT 4o, Unlimited Chat With ChatGPT4o
introduction: ChatGPT 4o is OpenAI's latest flagship model, capable of processing text, audio, image, and video inputs, and generating corresponding outputs. It offers both free and paid usage options with different features and capabilities.
features: Multimodal processing of text, audio, image, and video inputs
Enhanced performance in English and coding tasks
Improved capabilities in processing non-English languages
Built-in safety measures for ensuring safety
hasFreeTrial: Free Users can ask up to 10 questions per day with public Q&A and one question per minute.
targetPeople: Users looking for a versatile AI model for processing various types of inputs and generating outputs.
pricing: Free plan with limited features, $9.9 monthly subscription for 300 questions per day, and $59.9 annual subscription for unlimited questions per day.

faqs.question: Is ChatGPT4o free?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT4o offers both free and paid usage options. Free Users can ask up to 10 questions per day with public Q&A and one question per minute.

faqs.question: What are the multimodal capabilities of ChatGPT 4o?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT 4o can understand and process text, audio, image, and video inputs, generating corresponding outputs, making human-computer interactions more natural and intuitive.

faqs.question: How fast is ChatGPT4o's response time?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT4o can respond to audio inputs with latencies as low as 232 milliseconds, with an average response time of 320 milliseconds, which is close to human conversation speed.

faqs.question: What improvements does ChatGPT 4o have in language support?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT 4o has enhanced performance in English and coding tasks, and significantly improved capabilities in processing non-English languages.

faqs.question: How does ChatGPT 4o ensure safety?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT 4o includes built-in safety measures, such as filtering training data and refining behavior post-training. It has undergone extensive external testing to identify and mitigate risks.

faqs.question: What are the advantages of ChatGPT 4o?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT 4o offers significant advantages in multimodal processing, response speed, language support, and safety, making it suitable for various applications.

faqs.question: How does ChatGPT 4o differ from GPT-4 and Claude 3?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT 4o supports multimodal inputs and outputs, making it more comprehensive than GPT-4 and Claude 3. It also has notable advantages in response speed, language support, and safety.

faqs.question: What are the application scenarios for ChatGPT4o?
faqs.answer: ChatGPT4o is suitable for various application scenarios, including real-time translation, customer support, creative content generation, and interactive learning.

faqs.question: Where can I experience ChatGPT4o's text conversation capabilities?
faqs.answer: You can visit chatgpt4o.ai to experience GPT-4o's text conversation capabilities.
